body.name: LED Desk Lamp with Clip, Multi-Angle Flexible 4-Segment 3-Light Source Office Desk Lamp, Clip-on Eye-Care 4 Color Temperature Modes&5 Brightness, Table Lamp for Home Office Studio Study Nail
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 3 mins
features: [Efficient and Stylish Workspace]: The NUERPO Foldable LED Desk Lamp is an ideal complement to your office or home workspace, combining efficiency with a touch of style. This desk lamp not only offers abundant illumination but also adds a touch of elegance to your workspace. The adjustable lamp arm and head enable you to precisely direct the light to your desired position, ensuring optimal visibility, minimizing eye strain, enhancing work efficiency, and igniting your creative inspiration.

[Multi-functional Lighting]: The NUERPO foldable LED desk lamp provide multiple lighting options according to your preferences. Whether you want to create a comfortable atmosphere with soft warm light or need bright cool light to focus on work, this desk lamp has it all. With a 4-level dimmer, you can adjust the brightness according to your needs. In addition, the color temperature control function allows you to create the perfect lighting atmosphere for any occasion.

[Space-saving and Versatile] The foldable LED desk lamp by NUERPO is designed with convenience in mind. Its compact and foldable design makes it easy to store and carry, making it perfect for individuals with limited desk space or those who frequently travel. Equipped with a sturdy clamp, this desk lamp can be securely attached to any desk, shelf, or table, providing you with a stable lighting solution while freeing up valuable space.

[Energy-saving and Eco-friendly] Traditional desk lamps are not only energy-wasting but also harmful to our eyes. But with NUERPO's foldable LED desk lamp, you can now enjoy long-lasting and energy-efficient lighting. Its natural and flicker-free light can reduce eye fatigue and discomfort, allowing you to work or study for extended periods without feeling tired. Say hello to healthy and eco-friendly lighting with NUERPO's foldable LED desk lamp!

[About Us] NUERPO offers quality products and efficient after-sales service, and the Foldable LED Desk Lamp is no exception. Its modern and stylish aesthetics combined with durable construction ensures that it not only enhances your workspace, but also stands the test of time. If you encounter any problems during the use of the product, please feel free to contact us, we will be happy to serve you and provide you with a solution as soon as possible.
body.description: The NUERPO Desk Lamp delivers powerful illumination to your workspace, enabling you to engage in work, study, or reading for extended durations with ease. This LED desk lamp not only offers exceptional brightness but also operates with high energy efficiency. You can select from cool white light, warm yellow light, or a blend of both, ensuring that whether you're focused on tasks or engrossed in a captivating book, our desk lamps will cater to your specific requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, compact and flexible light
reviews.reviewText: We looked around a lot for a desk lamp for our kids study desk and came across this one. This is very compact and covers a wide area (which many other desk lamps do not)There are different light modes, and the light is very bright.Overall very sleek and sturdy.We bought 2 of them and are happy with our purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The light is sufficient for any purpose. I mainly use it to light up my keyboard so I can use it without having to turn on its ever-changing colors. The adjustability of the angle makes it easy for me to not have glare on the screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used the LED light to light up my desk at work. It worked great. It was flexible and just the right amount of light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm homeschooling 6 kids and have been looking for the perfect lamp. I'm impressed with this product, the features, easy installation, sleek and the range it covers. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as big as it appears in ad.
reviews.reviewText: The light will work for what I wanted but the ad picture is very deceiving. not as big or heavy duty as pictured.

reviews.reviewerName: Be the reason someone smiles today
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid build quality, bright lighting, worth purchasing.
reviews.reviewText: As I mentioned, this lamp is well-crafted with a solid build, bright lighting, and adjustable brightness and color temperature. It can be adjusted from multiple angles. One slight improvement could be made— the rotating joint is a bit tight and requires some effort to adjust. However, this also enhances the stability of the desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice desk light
reviews.reviewText: I am happy with the product, it works well and is a very nice design.
